lines.text: The product of the displacement and the force parallel to the displacement

secText:
Essential Question:
How can we calculate the amount of work done on an object?

Enduring Understandings:
1. When the [OBJ:expsec_f954:force on an object is parallel to the displacement] of the object, then the [OBJ:expsec_f956:work] is equal to the force multiplied by the displacement.
